tests.name: Unit | validateEmail valid inputs returns true for a valid email
Unit | validateEmail invalid inputs returns false for invalid email values
Unit | userController createUser returns 400 when name is empty
Unit | userController createUser returns 400 when email is invalid
Unit | userController createUser returns 201 and saves trimmed values for valid input
Unit | userController getUserById returns 404 when user does not exist
Unit | userController getUserById returns 200 and user when user exists
Unit | userController deleteUser returns 404 when user does not exist
Unit | userController deleteUser returns 204 and removes user when user exists
API | user contract POST /users returns 201 with created user shape
API | user contract POST /users returns 400 for invalid email
API | user contract GET /users/:id returns 200 with expected user
API | user contract DELETE /users/:id returns 204 and empty body
Integration | user routes POST /users creates a user successfully
Integration | user routes POST /users returns 400 for invalid data
Integration | user routes GET /users returns all users
Integration | user routes GET /users/:id returns one user by ID
Integration | user routes GET /users/:id returns 404 when user is missing
Integration | user routes DELETE /users/:id deletes user successfully
Integration | user routes DELETE /users/:id returns 404 if user does not exist
Database | MongoDB persistence create and read creates and reads a user from MongoDB
Database | MongoDB persistence delete deletes a user from MongoDB
